title: Toys and games market : market segmentation by value 2009
summary: This bar chart has 7 categories for the x axis representing Name, and a y axis representing Market share.
The highest category is found at Other where Market share is 30.5.
The lowest category is found at Plush_toys where Market share is 5.1.
gold: This graph depicts the share of toy categories of the total market value in 2009 . Activity toys accounted for 15.1 percent of total toys and games market revenue .
